32a6('bum): sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o//
32a7('bum): bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
32b1('bum): bar bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong
32b2('bum): pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
32b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
32b4('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mnga' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad
32b5('bum): kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma ma/
32b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o//
32b7('bum): bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs
33a1('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
33a2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems
33a3('bum): can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa stong
33a4('bum): pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos
33a5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag/
33a6('bum): pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can
33a7('bum): thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar
33b1('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems
33b2('bum): can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyan
33b3('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o//
33b4('bum): bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan
33b5('bum): rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can
33b6('bum): thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzug
33b7('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar ba
34a1('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
34a2('bum): bar 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad
34a3('bum): kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sem
34a4('bum): can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar
34a5('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshogs
34a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o//
34a7('bum): sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag
34b1('bum): bya ris pa ba'i la sbyar bar bya'o/ bdag gis kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas
34b2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa
34b3('bum): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
34b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshesbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
34b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
34b6('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo ste 'don byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i /
34b7('bum): cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing
35a1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa
35a2('bum): yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
35a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
35a4('bum): pa la spyod cing // sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs
35a5('bum): su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
35a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
35a7('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang /
35b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong
35b2('bum): ba'i bsam gtun gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sod
35b3('bum): su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs
35b4('bum): gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes
35b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha sa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin
35b6('bum): pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o//
35b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs
36a1('bum): sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs
36a2('bum): su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
36a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la
36a4('bum): yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
36a5('bum): tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol/
36a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i//
36a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims
36b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rnams par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pa
36b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims
36b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshenyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi sgo mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
36b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
36b5('bum): du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams
36b6('bum): cing mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims nges
36b7('bum): rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
37a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha
37a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs
37a3('bum): su 'dzin pa ste/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
37a4('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge
37a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
37a6('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
37a7('bum): rol tu byin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs
37b1('bum): su bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni// byang chub sems
37b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i'o pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dag
37b3('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byungs
37b4('bum): ngag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang
37b5('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'i
37b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
37b7('bum): byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa/
38a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
38a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
38a3('bum): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/
38a4('bum): spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
38a5('bum): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa/
38a6('bum): thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
38a7('bum): tu byin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong
38b1('bum): zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'don// byang chub sems
38b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
38b3('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyen thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
38b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
38b5('bum): su bsngo ba 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
38b6('bum): chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cing mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod cing
38b7('bum): chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsong pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
39a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sbyar dwa to bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thar thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid lta byu sum yid / rnam pa rnams
39a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing bdun mi ngas pa 'di ni
39a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi ba
39a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldana'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di
39a5('bum): nibartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang /
39a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/
39a7('bum): brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang
39b1('bum): sa san smra m+b+ha sa na stsa su na stsa gu smra
39b2('bum): mas pa mas da chen pa 'grus kyi la tu gyur pas de ra gyud ba/ pa ma gyur bajug papa byung mamasu gyi pa
39b3('bum): dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub semasna pa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir pa la sbyang nga ca thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
39b4('bum): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
39b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
39b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi
39b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par
40a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
40a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa tham
40a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
40a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
40a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
40a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
40a7('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
40b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bru bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa
40b2('bum): gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba rnams kyi sgo mo 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ thar
40b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
40b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/
40b5('bum): bsam gtan nges kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cang dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang
40b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe nga ldan pa shAr dwa dwa'i bu byu
40b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu byor pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te// de'i phyir po chechen po
41a1('bum): bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
41a2('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs
41a3('bum): su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni// byang chub
41a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
41a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/
41a6('bum): la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
41a7('bum): bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
41b1('bum): be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yong la bya bas ma yin gyi// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yang la
41b2('bum): bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
41b3('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
41b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
41b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
41b6('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
41b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
42a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dung thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
42a2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
42a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
42a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
42a5('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
42a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu
42a7('bum): phyin pa'ang dag dang / sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mo dmigs pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol du
42b1('bum): byir pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas
42b2('bum): gang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa t+yA'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
42b3('bum): chen po pasam btan dang / tshang med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa rnams pa yang mnyam par gnogs bas mo gtan dung / tshad med pa dang
42b4('bum): gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro yang stong bar ma byed do// khrims gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
42b5('bum): gis kyang mi 'phrogs bsam gtan dang / ts+tshad myed pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// myo dang ldan pa shAr dwa ba'i bu 'dim na
42b6('bum): rlung spangs dang ngadus sma ba rten pa shes rab kyi la tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i babs sabyas par gathogs pa'o// ga shAr du nga bya rgyu
42b7('bum): sems dpa' rarnamabasam gtan dang / tshang mang ba dang gcigs meng par sgoms par 'jug pa ga la dber par mameng ba dang / spong bcing dag ma sa mi me ba
43a1('bum): smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang rang
43a2('bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
43a3('bum): mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// // shes
43a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga dgu pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar na go cha bgos pa la shar phyogs
43a5('bum): kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams grad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhug pa rnam kya ched du rjod pa da brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jog rten gyi khams che
43a6('bum): ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//
43a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho phyogs kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
43b1('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
43b2('bum): kho bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
43b3('bum): rjes su sgrog go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su
43b4('bum): sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do//
43b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
43b6('bum): bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su smrig pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na
43b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bags pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'jul
44a1('bum): gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
44a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa'
44a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o
44a4('bum): zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
44a5('bum): rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgeg pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu
44a6('bum): ga sems can yongs su smon par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes spa brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su zlog go// lho nub kyi
44a7('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod tsang ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/
44b1('bum): ngas chen gyi khams cheg mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma chem po bsgos pa 'du bu zhig sems can yongs su smon par byed do// sangs rgyas su
44b2('bum): yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byung gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA grung
44b3('bum): gibye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing med yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na
44b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge ma chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul
44b5('bum): gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa
44b6('bum): ba rnams kyang cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mong yongs su theg pa mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po po che chen po bgyis
44b7('bum): pa 'dis bu'ig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par phye'o zhes spa brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su
45a1('bum): sgrog go// seng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
45a2('bum): ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
45a3('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/
45a4('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa'
45a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
45a6('bum): la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa
45a7('bum): dben pa lnga skyes pa'i dga' ba nga 'bade ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas nang yongs su da
45b1('bum): sems nga smrags gyur byas rnam par drugs med pa rnam par dbyed pa myed pa sasasu sa ba dang 'de sa na du sa smra
45b2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs kyi gnas so// nga dga' ba las bdang chags dang bral bas dran pa dang sgranas pa shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bang bulus kyis smrang su man
45b3('bum): bya rnams kyis de ma dran pa dang thun pa dade ba la rnam par spyod pa pata snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa'o// dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs teg
45b4('bum): so// de bde ba yang spangs thug bsngal pa yang spangs shingayid bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa 'ang
45b5('bum): rnams dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya rten pa shin tu sangs pa mi gnyis pa/ da mengs
45b6('bum): gzugs med paganod pa med pa/ sdod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jog rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
45b7('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/
46a1('bum): tshad med pagacugs med pa gnod pa med pa/ lhong pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
46a2('bum): kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin
46a3('bum): tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos
46a4('bum): kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod ngo // de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
46a5('bum): btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yengs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa bcugs med pa gnod pa med pa smod pa med pa/ yongs su
46a6('bum): rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
46a7('bum): spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi
46b1('bum): byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mtha' mtha' yas skye mched pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cang du rnam mkha mtha' yas skye mched
46b2('bum): las yang dgu par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
46b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad med po'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad
46b4('bum): med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes mod min skye mched la mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub
46b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gnyen te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med
46b6('bum): pan yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gnog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
46b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig te mo dge pa'i chos kyi dben pa/
47a1('bum): rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan drang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
47a2('bum): de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ cing
47a3('bum): nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes
47a4('bum): bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dag
47a5('bum): ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing // yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas//
47a6('bum): bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs
47a7('bum): pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
47b1('bum): klas pA/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems ma chen po shin tu yangs pa
47b2('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
47b3('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa
47b4('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa// gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
47b5('bum): nam mnga'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po
47b6('bum): shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos
47b7('bum): kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
48a1('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te
48a2('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
48a3('bum): yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod /
48a4('bum): do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
48a5('bum): med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems
48a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med nga 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas ma
48a7('bum): par gzhog cing rnam par sdang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'ang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
48b1('bum): gyur ba'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dber sdig tom dge ban chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang sras bu/ dpyong pa dang smras pa/
48b2('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhe nas rang yongs su dang ste/
48b3('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde btsun bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgru
48b4('bum): de gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la na
48b5('bum): ba dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dbade ba yang spangs
48b6('bum): sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan
48b7('bum): bil nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa lhong
49a1('bum): pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
49a2('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/
49a3('bum): gnod pa med pa/ ltong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pashin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
49a4('bum): par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med po
49a5('bum): gnod pa med pa lhong pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
49a6('bum): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa
49a7('bum): tshong med pa// gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa / spong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam
49b1('bum): mnga'i mthus gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cang du gzugs kyi 'du shes pas yang nga
49b2('bum): thigs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing tshogs kyi 'du shes yang la mi byed pas rnam pakha' mtha' yas so nas te rnam pa ma du mas smye
49b3('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes zhes
49b4('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mthu' yas skye mched las yang dag pur 'das te/ cung zang mu yod de zhes cung
49b5('bum): zang med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes ming 'du shes med min skye
49b6('bum): mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b7('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog
50a1('bum): cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol
50a2('bum): tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa
50a3('bum): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas rlung yongs su dang ste/
50a4('bum): semams kyi rgyu gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs
50a5('bum): te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis da la
50a6('bum): dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms de'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang sna
50a7('bum): sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yang bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa bzhing snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan pa'i//
50b1('bum): kla / smra swA lca sa / na/
50b2('bum): ltung ba med pa/ yongs su rnags tu brnams pas 'du shin rjes kyi rmongs kyis sa pa rnam sa 'ang sargyas gtugs pa'i thugs tha nas
50b3('bum): sa par gyu shi rnam par spyod / d+he dang ldan pa sa na mas / byas pa nga / gcub smra nga
50b4('bum): spyod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pashin su ba sgoms pas 'jig rten rjes dbyings kyis zas pa rnamam pa'i mthus gtugs pa'i rtsigs na rgyas
50b5('bum): mas par byas shi rnam par byed do// dag ba dang blun pa'i sems rgyu rmen da na tu sbyangs bu mi gnas bya ts+tsha med pa / gzugs myed pa 'du ba
50b6('bum): med pa ga spong pa med pa// yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bstims pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
50b7('bum): ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gtses pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
51a1('bum): med pa / gnod pa med pa spong pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ rnam
51a2('bum): mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
51a3('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid lo mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mad
51a4('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha'
51a5('bum): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i
51a6('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi
51a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsam
51b1('bum): gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cung rnam bur ljang
51b2('bum): ba'i tshe snang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam
51b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa
51b4('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig/
51b5('bum): tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
51b6('bum): dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba
51b7('bum): la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs
52a1('bum): shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med ba btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la
52a2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod/
52a3('bum): pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/
52a4('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa / mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa
52a5('bum): lhong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
52a6('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod // de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa med
52a7('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shi'i
52b1('bum): rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa tshad med pa// gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa
52b2('bum): lhod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa / 'ashin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ ram mkha'i mthus gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang sde
52b3('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur tsang snatsa
52b4('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha
52b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
52b6('bum): cang du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams
52b7('bum): cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni/
53a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med
53a2('bum): pa 'di dag dang / gzugs meng ba nu yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad
53a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
53a4('bum): 'dod pas dben// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
53a5('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par
53a6('bum): rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba//
53a7('bum): las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde/
53b1('bum): ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang
53b2('bum): spangs shing/ yid bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar
53b3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa
53b4('bum): stong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par
53b5('bum): bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa
53b6('bum): gnod pa med pa/ ldod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthus gtugs pa'i phyogs bcwa
53b7('bum): rgyas par bgang / mam par byas shing rnam par spong ngo // de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ se zugs med pa/
54a1('bum): gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
54a2('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/
54a3('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
54a4('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang
54a5('bum): dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
54a6('bum): mched la nye bar bsgyangs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes
54a7('bum): mtha' yas skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas su mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad
54b1('bum): meng pa'i sgyu ma rnyed la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung bad med pa'i sgyum ched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes mer 'du shes meng ba
54b2('bum): mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsrubs te gnas so// 'dini byeng chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i bsdum gtan te/ rnam byang chub sems dpa' sems
54b3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par
54b4('bum): gzog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'don/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tun
54b5('bum): ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
54b6('bum): dashwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mo gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs
54b7('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i
55a1('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa
55a2('bum): tshad med pa gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ rnyed pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jog rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mal
55a3('bum): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa
55a4('bum): tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa
55a5('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/
55a6('bum): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
55a7('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/
55b1('bum): rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang /
55b2('bum): rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa
55b3('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su
55b4('bum): gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam
55b5('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde bsnga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba
55b6('bum): yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btung snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
55b7('bum): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so/
56a1('bum): zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
56a2('bum): par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched lu nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
56a3('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las
56a4('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te//
56a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /
56a6('bum): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang /
56a7('bum): de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa
56b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag pas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
56b2('bum): mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di la ste/ nyan thos samya rang sangs rgyas kyis yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyis so mo 'byed ba de ni/ bya bachub sems das
56b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
56b4('bum): la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
56b5('bum): bzod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud bar byed pa 'di ni
56b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
56b7('bum): yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang /
57a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
57a2('bum): phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
57a3('bum): nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
57a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
57a5('bum): bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang
57a6('bum): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med
57a7('bum): ba'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i
57b1('bum): rnam pa dung stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
57b2('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
57b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA raNI
57b4('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bani sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par
57b5('bum): spong ba ba'i snyam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i snyam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po rdzu tham pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs kyis
57b6('bum): pa dang / rnam pa rnams car dbyang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam brgyad pa kres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags
57b7('bum): bangan pa rnams skom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtam rnams sem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams skem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du
58a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyi
58a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam
58a3('bum): pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang
58a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dngarnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag
58a5('bum): par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs
58a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang //
58a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o//
58b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad/
58b2('bum): yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting rje 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse ba'i nyams
58b3('bum): su byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dkrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms kyi ting nge
58b4('bum): 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
58b5('bum): pa rnams la stong pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan
58b6('bum): ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yangarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtsigs par nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mo sngo ba 'di ni/
58b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
59a1('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa
59a2('bum): gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
59a3('bum): chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
59a4('bum): pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
59a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang tshad
59a6('bum): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i/
59a7('bum): dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
59b1('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la bya bas bas
59b2('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang
59b3('bum): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam
59b4('bum): par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'dri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
59b5('bum): phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
59b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ byi nang stong pa
59b7('bum): nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
60a1('bum): ma yin don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin
60a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin// thog ma dang tha ma
60a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang
60a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
60a5('bum): gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/
60a6('bum): nyid stong ba nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
60a7('bum): ci'i bu 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa/
60b1('bum): rjen pon chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi gzug cing ma nyam par gnog par shes pa smra/ tshe dang blur pA sh+tha ra dwa ti'i bu'adi ni zung chub sems dang 'asas snang nga
60b2('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'dzuH
60b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi
60b4('bum): 'jug bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
60b5('bum): bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
60b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la
60b7('bum): 'dod ba dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med paste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chung sems
61a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa /
61a2('bum): kho ni 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas
61a3('bum): chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang
61a4('bum): bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi
61a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems
61a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
61a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/
61b1('bum): sgyu sgru ma / nga na pa smra
61b2('bum): mi pa kyis smin pacwo sa tu byer phrul yang dug bla gnas nas / nga shA d+d+ha nA~M nga rgyu sa
61b3('bum): rten shes ba kyi rol du sbyin pa ma spyod pa'i rdzu/ rgyas kyims rnam phyin pa la yang dag par gnas rgyu sa khrims sa ga
61b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dasogs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya bu dag sa du mi dmigs te/ du skar dbyang chub sems dpa 'am
61b5('bum): dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems bar
61b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i
61b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
62a1('bum): da na pa su dgas pa mas pa pa na na pa la spyang dag ga su ga/
62a2('bum): rgyub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten po shes rab kyi pa ra la tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyis rlab tu phyin pa lnga yang dag par gnas ny-id partson rdzas
62a3('bum): mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la b+hu ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar
62a4('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
62a5('bum): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang nges
62a6('bum): bsam gtan yang mi dmigs bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/
62a7('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shwar
62b1('bum): bu ngas byung chu sem su mas dpa snyan pa gas rab ga gyur ba la spyod pa ma dos tu byad dus sa ga smra smra bya
62b2('bum): ba chos kyang ma mags/ mi dge bdung / rlungs ra ba dang 'du las 'das pa dang / dus rgyas da / sa rnas dang
62b3('bum): dbyu/ zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmags shing shes rab cang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi rol tu rten pa yang sa m-ig+sasabyang chub sems dpa
62b4('bum): dmigs yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab pha rol tu tu pa la yang dag par
62b5('bum): gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
62b6('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bru ba ma 'dres
62b7('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byi stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
63a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de ma dmigs pa'i rgyal gyis b+h+rUM nang stong ba nyid smom s+ho// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldad bla yod la bya
63a2('bum): ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
63a3('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma
63a4('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
63a5('bum): pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/
63a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
63a7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
63b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul mas thogs dang tham med pa spyod pa nyid thos so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yang sa sgrubs
63b2('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgrom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar 'dres
63b3('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
63b4('bum): bas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
63b5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/
63b6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
63b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
64a1('bum): bzlam pa rnam par bslus pa'i don du ma dum gas d+ma'i rgyu la gyis babyu stong pa byad slob so// ma parnams car mgyud pa da gyu
64a2('bum): zla ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa ring bo nyid stong pa nyid thom po/ mye dang wAn pA shwaru dwa ti'i brungs
