64a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du ngo ma dmigs
64a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
64a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
64a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
64a7('bum): du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi
64b1('bum): dgas pa phrus byas byabs ldams so// rnam samams cad ma khyen pa ning dang ldan pa'i yang lta bu bus 'dres pa gas pa sa byung ba du su su ma
64b2('bum): pa chum kyis byang chub kyi yan las bdun smras so// rnam pa thams kyu mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bar 'dres byaste ma pa rnam par bas
64b3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
64b4('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la b+ha ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom
64b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
64b6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
64b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don pu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
65a1('bum): la b+hA ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshum gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad som s+ho// rnam pa thams da
65a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i ngan du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom
65a3('bum): mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang
65a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
65a5('bum): pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
65a6('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa
65a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams skem mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ brtson
65b1('bum): marnam par bzhes pa'i don du ngomi migasas pa'i tshul gyis ban na ga shegs pa'i slobs pan smos s+ho/ rnam pa rnams kyad ma khyed du dra dadu lda nga sa sa
65b2('bum): 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
65b3('bum): bam 'dres pas/ bskum pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyismra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi snyom ma// rnam pa thams cad mthun pa'i dru nga
65b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bu ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
65b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom mo// tshe dang
65b6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
65b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'ang ni tha snyad tsam du
66a1('bum): byung du zhes bya bar shes so// bzlums dmigs su myong ba ltar gathugs ces zla ba dan mo la du bang // bya migs su su pa nga
66a2('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // 'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du shes zhes bya ba 'drin ming tsam du zung ngo // 'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'du byed
66a3('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'din ming tsam du zad de/ mig dmigs su med pa'i phyi
66a4('bum): mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna zhes bya ba 'ang ni
66a5('bum): ming tsam du zad do// lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
66a6('bum): yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sgra dmigs
66a7('bum): su med pa'i phyir sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // dri dmigs su med pa'i phyir dri zhes bya ba 'di na mong tsam du zad // ro dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di
66b1('bum): med nas du zang // res ngamigs su med par byur rnyeg ces bya ba 'dini srid tsam du byud do// chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos zhes bya bya di slong ya smram/
66b2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mog gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dron mang nam du byud do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phy-ir rje
66b3('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo //
66b4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi
66b5('bum): rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dini mong tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do//
66b6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'don ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i
66b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di na mong tsam du zad // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'dzin ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus
67a1('bum): te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
67a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
67a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
67a4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
67a5('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir
67a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'ang ni ming tsam du bang ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
67a7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba don ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba 'tshor ba zhes byag/
67b1('bum): 'ang mang tsam du bang ngo // sa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'din mang tsam du zad do// chu'i khams dmigs su med pa byor chu khams zhes bya ba
67b2('bum): 'dri ni ming tsam du zad do// me'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams zhes bya ba
67b3('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// nam mkha'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i
67b4('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmigs su
67b5('bum): mang pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mi de tsam du zad do// ming dang gcus
67b6('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di mang tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmigs su med pa'i sgor skye mched drug ces bya ba 'din ming tsam du bad do//
67b7('bum): rig pa dmigs sa med pa'i phyir reg pa zhes bya ba'i don ming tsam du bad / tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di mi ming cim dung ngo// phreng pa dmigs sa
68a1('bum): med pa'i phyir sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// srid pa dmig
68a2('bum): su med pa'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmigs su med pa'i byor rga
68a3('bum): zhes bya ba'ang ni ming tsam du zad ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir skyon po'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // tshul khrims kyi
68a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'ang ra mod tsam du zang // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir bzod par
68a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'ang ni mong tsam du zad do// brtsonu 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa zhes zla ba 'di ni mi nab du
68a6('bum): rnam pa da kyi pha la du phying bar migs su meng po'i dor smram ga kyi byo rol du byed pa nyes zla pa 'dren mong su du ba sa rab kyi par sa
68a7('bum): ma la 'as kyi mom pa byed pa'is bya ba 'dzod palal du rung ba cing migs su ma pa'i phyir dang song bas sa bya 'ang mongs
68b1('bum): dubung du/ bu mang ba nyi ngamags su med par gyur bya pa nyid ces bya bya 'don mang rnam du bang po nga dang+tha ny-id dmags sgra med pa dbang du shA
68b2('bum): 'angan ming cam du byud do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir spyod pa nyid srid panyid ces bya ba 'dun mo la ma du da de/ don pa rnyed pa nyi dmigs
68b3('bum): med pa'i phyir chen pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'dun med tsam du pa // don dam pastong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir don dam bye stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'dir mA tsam du bang gi/
68b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du bang ngo // 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'dus pa
68b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di na ming tsam du
68b6('bum): zad ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
68b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di
69a1('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // rang gi
69a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi
69a3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
69a4('bum): ngo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med
69a5('bum): pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa ni zhes
69a6('bum): ba'adir ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong bu rnams dmigs su meng ba'i phyir yang dag par spyod pa bani zhes bya ba 'di na snying tsam du byung // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang /
69a7('bum): rnams dmigs su meng pa tshong rngu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i shes bya ba 'dir mong tsal du bang ngo // bang po rnam mapas su me pa 'byung baji rdzags grub dza'i yol yang
69b1('bum): khang ngo // stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rlobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su myed pa'i phyir byang chub tu yan lan
69b2('bum): bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni mong tsam du zad do// lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du bang ngo // 'phags pa'i bded pa
69b3('bum): rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di
69b4('bum): ri ming tsam du zad ngo // tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmig
69b5('bum): su med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya
69b6('bum): ba 'do na ming tsam du bang ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
69b7('bum): du bang rnam par thar pa'i sgo song ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sdom pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo spong panyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
70a1('bum): smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di na meng tsam du byung ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'dzi mang na ma
70a2('bum): khang ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'ang ni ming tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo zhes b+ha ba
70a3('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad // mi 'jig
70a4('bum): pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
70a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// snying rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs
70a6('bum): su med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do//
70a7('bum): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa
70b1('bum): sa bya ba 'a ni sang su sa po/ chos nyid dbugs su snang pa phyir chos kyang rjes bu masas dru dang / sa mas su
70b2('bum): ra chos kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba 'din ming cam du zang ba// chos ky-i kunas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ces bu ba 'di ni mang ma du nga /
70b3('bum): ming pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos sbyor med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming nam du bang // yang dag pa'i mtha' darigs su med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' rjes du rje
70b4('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du bang ngo // byang chub yogs su med ba'i phyir byang chub ces bye ba 'dun mong tsam du bang do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
70b5('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag
70b6('bum): par gnas zhes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po drug bcu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
70b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing
71a1('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas
71a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang phu dung du bya ba dang mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs
71a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas
71a4('bum): kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
71a5('bum): 'du shes kyang mi 'byung sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shong lus ji lta bu
71a6('bum): sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to// de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma nur
71a7('bum): kyi bar du theg pa de dang nam ru yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang /
71b1('bum): rlung da sbyin dang / rdzab dang / sa spyan dang / rnams pa rjong dang ma dang / / da /
71b2('bum): 'jig rten gyis bsgyur bar mnus pani rgyas pa ra lo bcu bgyur ro// de rgyun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu ma bar rdzogs pas su
71b3('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye masnyed dag nA sang+yas rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig pa
71b4('bum): khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad
71b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs
71b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig
71b7('bum): tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/
72a1('bum): bya bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig
72a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub
72a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
72a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
72a5('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
72a6('bum): bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo
72a7('bum): bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
72b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po bla na med pa
72b2('bum): theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
72b3('bum): byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// shwar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom
72b4('bum): ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg
72b5('bum): ba theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do
72b6('bum): zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
72b7('bum): bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa ga/ theg pa'i
73a1('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
73a2('bum): byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
73a3('bum): bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg
73a4('bum): pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog
73a5('bum): cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzan
73a6('bum): cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa
73a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi byasas
73b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byung
73b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa
73b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad de/ de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra tI'i bu byang chub sems
73b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
73b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so go cha chen po bgos so zhes bag+h+nAn/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po po che chen pa bgos ma
73b6('bum): bas pa lags de gang ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'dil byang chub sems dpa'
73b7('bum): sems dpa' tshar po zag pacan pa'i gi mgyon cing 'dis / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ga cha bsos/ tshul khrims kyi ma rol tu phyin pa 'ig cham gyis/ bzang par
74a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos shes rab kyi
74a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha
74a3('bum): bgos chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos
74a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go rba bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi gom bgos/ chos thams cad stong
74a5('bum): pa nyid kyi go cha bgos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos ngo bo nyid
74a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu/
74a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos dbang po'i go cha bgos stobs kyi go cha bgos byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden
74b1('bum): pa'i go cha bgos bsam gtan gyi go cha bgosatshad med pa'i go cha bgos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha
74b2('bum): bgos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos
74b3('bum): mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos mi 'jigs pa'i 'o/
74b4('bum): cha bgos so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos rnam pa thams cad
74b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste shar phyogs kyi
74b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
74b7('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so//
75a1('bum): dubya/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
75a2('bum): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// rlung byang
75a3('bum): gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
75a4('bum): bar 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa
75a5('bum): drug tu rab tu bskyod do// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
75a6('bum): rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod ngo // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
75a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod ngo // shar
75b1('bum): tshogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bstod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi rje ma skyed
75b2('bum): rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// nub byeng gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
75b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi rjem snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod // des
75b4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
75b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs ldog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyangs
75b6('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag/
75b7('bum): nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stob
76a1('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
76a2('bum): zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song
76a3('bum): gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par
76a4('bum): ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
76a5('bum): dang de dag tu skye'o// nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig
76a6('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i snga brjod do// byangs rtag /
76a7('bum): chos shing rje'i 'jos rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thobs/ de dag dga' ba dang bang ba nges gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
76b1('bum): sa / su su
76b2('bum): de dang dri ga / des yar byas kyi ga rten gyi rnams pang+gA rlung ga sa 'dus/ byung ba snying sa nga byung gi sa
76b3('bum): par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dul phyug 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tha brjod do// dbyangs sto so// de'i tshisas sa
76b4('bum): dbul ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde bathob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems cad dmyal ba de dag nas rnam pa
76b5('bum): ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de
76b6('bum): dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med
76b7('bum): par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems
77a1('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob skye/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can
77a2('bum): dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
77a3('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod
77a4('bum): pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o sgra brjod do// dbyangs
77a5('bum): sdug go// de'i chosems can dmyal ba pa'i sems cad de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa dethos nas/ dga' ba dang bde bzo sa de dag dga' ba deng ba 'angs sems car
77a6('bum): dbral pa dengs nas rnam par rung ngo // de dag sems can myal ba d+ma dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nasangs rgyas sa lda na
77a7('bum): bkyang byags kyi 'jig sa mas pad brangs kyim mas yul pa 'i lu ba ma
77b1('bum): sa sa nga sa sa pa 'a
77b2('bum): / de tshasems cad dmyal bya ba'i sems na dedas kyang sangs rgyas kyi pa chos / ngag pa dang ba babyu/ dedag dga' ba dang 'a
77b3('bum): can dpral pa de dganas rnam par rjong ngo // dedug sems can dmyal ba ng+ya nas rnam par yang nas/ sa rgyas kyi shing ga dang gA nasangs nas
77b4('bum): rnams bzugs shing 'tsho skyeng pa de dang de dag tu kyi'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ba bye ma med dag na/ sems can
77b5('bum): ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
77b6('bum): sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag ga
77b7('bum): ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dog nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs
78a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu spro'o// nges shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
78a2('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
78a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/
78a4('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs
78a5('bum): nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho slong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho rub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'dza
78a6('bum): chen khams pang+gA'i thung gi khyim snyed dag / sems ca dang skyes pa'i ma'i thang ba 'i ga yod pa dag thams sa med par byas te/ debazhi gshegs pa dam sam sa ngas/
78a7('bum): la mapa/ sa mchim pa ma pa sa#

84a1('bum): bya/ pa mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor lo sgyur
84a2('bum): ba'i sring mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do// bzhen pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa

84a5('bum): rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tshe ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// ye byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang mo byang

84b1('bum): babyed do// des de sbyar bas 'dod pa la zas byin som 'dod pa la gom byi/ bzon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa la pos byin/ me tog 'ang drubal ste

84b3('bum): ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /

84b5('bum): byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/
84b6('bum): sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi
84b7('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchar bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
85a1('bum): mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin// banon pa 'dod
85a2('bum): pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin// gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin// me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod
85a3('bum): pa rnams la ni spos byin byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal chu 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin// 'tsho ba 'dod
85a4('bum): pa rnams la ni 'tshe ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig
85a5('bum): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUn dang / dung dang / man shes dang /
85a6('bum): byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan por
85a7('bum): mtshan bu des sems can gang la tsa yang byin pa yong dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang 'byor de ban
85b1('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'azor los sbyar ba'i srid mngon par sprul te/ byas 'dod pa rnamasal ni bas byin/ som 'dod pa rnams la ni skyomatshun/
85b2('bum): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin gos 'dod pa rnams la mi gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'gro
85b3('bum): ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spros byin/ thug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni drug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la nomal na byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni
85b4('bum): khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni na kyi rkyer rtsi dang yo byad
85b5('bum): byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+m+ma dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hirU dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUn+da sa
85b6('bum): drung dang / man shel dang / byi R+Ya dang / gau sngar dngul byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang tsaM yang byin pa med do//
85b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor ngan sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a1('bum): dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
86a2('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas sems can rnam
86a3('bum): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'gong do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa
86a4('bum): lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
86a5('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyar
86a6('bum): dang / mthar rgyas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / dngan
86a7('bum): gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa pazhi dang / sas yang dag par rig pa pazhi dang / ting rje chen pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ca rgya
86b1('bum): sems can rnams rab tu 'god do// sems can de dag sdang blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma sbyar hU~M bar du chos bsnu
86b2('bum): de dang num yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 'dro
86b3('bum): 'dug s+ho/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan
86b4('bum): bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
86b5('bum): par spong ba bzhi drung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
86b6('bum): rnam par thar pa'i so spong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa d+ma / rnam par bar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
86b7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa pan ngo
87a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sing rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod+hAn/ rab
87a2('bum): 'byor de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu nges sems can gang yang dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam
87a3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
87a4('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
87a5('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
87a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
87a7('bum): dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/
87b1('bum): gsol pa ka bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sam+b+has
87b2('bum): can tshad med pa grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
87b3('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
87b4('bum): yan lag bdun dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa
87b5('bum): brgyang dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden phra bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang
87b6('bum): de bzhi gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ba'i dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
87b7('bum): mabakong kyang sems can ga'i yang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor detse'i phyir zhen/ ngo'i snga ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung ra gtses rnams kyi ches nyid kyi
88a1('bum): bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
88a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar
88a3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/
88a4('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyig pas brdeg cing
88a5('bum): mtshon gyis 'debs kyang // de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba
88a6('bum): la rab tu 'god par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/
88a7('bum): skye bo mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang rab tu 'god par byas na// rab 'byor de la ji snyam
88b1('bum): du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzhag pa yong dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan sa
88b2('bum): de ri ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod
88b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/
88b4('bum): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
88b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing
88b6('bum): gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson
88b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
89a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 'god do//
89a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi
89a3('bum): mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bskod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am
89a4('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu bkod pa yod dam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//
89a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
89a6('bum): la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
89a7('bum): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang /
89b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyir pa la yang dag par bsub
89b2('bum): zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can tham sa
89b3('bum): cang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
89b4('bum): thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing/ chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
89b5('bum): ba la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par
89b6('bum): bskul ba rnams kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du// nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral
89b7('bum): bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang
90a1('bum): po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sem/
90a2('bum): sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
90a3('bum): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi
90a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can grang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'o chos nyid nye bar
90a5('bum): bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab
90a6('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing // sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
90a7('bum): par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad
90b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
90b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am tshu rol lam/ pha rol tu mi
90b3('bum): dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad
90b4('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
90b5('bum): mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shigs mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
90b6('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dgra par bskul te gzhog cing 'god na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems b+hU mo'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can
90b7('bum): gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor
91a1('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes
91a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/
91a3('bum): rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
91a4('bum): po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du
91a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar
91a6('bum): bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol
91a7('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems
91b1('bum): nAn ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bsgral zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar ba dag brtson 'grus kying rol tu
91b2('bum): phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems nan ji snyed cig 'khong pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskus
91b3('bum): zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag
91b4('bum): thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gnog go// 'god do// ji ltar ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin
91b5('bum): dudu'ajig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do//
91b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma
91b7('bum): rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rtsi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed ngag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin
92a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
92a2('bum): la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed
92a3('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
92a4('bum): pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'go
92a5('bum): do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyangabartson
92a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi bam
92a7('bum): de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar bdag shes rab
92b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
92b2('bum): bar bskul 'ong gzhog go// 'byed do// 'dis ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas blan med pa yang
92b3('bum): ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du rob tu phyin pa drug dang nas yang rdul bar mi 'gyur ro// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten rje'ams bam
92b4('bum): rung ba rgya ma med ngag se nga / ji skar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu byur ba la banos pa'i bzhin du/ 'jig rte ste'am sa da ngas nasem so me nga zhing kya myong ba dasmra sa
92b5('bum): / sbyin pa'i pharlol du phyi bu la yang dag par daphrul zhing gzhigs/ shod do// ji ltar bad/ tshul mas kyi ba ma su ldan pa la byanus pa de sbyin du ga 'a
92b6('bum): sa da du sengs ji snyi nag yod pa dag pasdus cu byung / rgyas khrims sa par smra la yang dag par zlos zhing gas na byung /
92b7('bum): 'ang ni me pa'i pha sa du phyin pa la gangs pa bzhin du/ 'dzin na gyi mas ris sems cad dzatha~Mng kyis yang par ngas bam cang mang / babang pa'i 'i rol tu phyi pa
93a1('bum): dag par bskul zhing gzhog go// 'god do// ji ltar ba dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin dug 'jig rter gyi khams de dpan
93a2('bum): sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 'god do// ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi
