183a7('bum): chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba/
183b1('bum): zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
183b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
183b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spo ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
183b4('bum): sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing sngo ba myong bar bya ba'o// de la
183b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang
183b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe
183b7('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam du sems shing // bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang+gA'i
184a1('bum): bya/ klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du de dag tu gtub cing gshe/
184a2('bum): pa dang brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byed
184a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang
184a4('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o// de la
184a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin
184a6('bum): par bya ba'i phyir/ las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su tshol ba ste// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing
184a7('bum): tshol ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi
184b1('bum): khams 'di 'amaphyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ci bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzungs par bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
184b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thogs pas mi ngoms pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang
184b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe// chos kyi sbyin pa nges chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med
184b4('bum): bar chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su sngob gang
184b5('bum): zhe na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ba ste/ 'di ni
184b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su sngo ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
184b7('bum): dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar bstan na sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
185a1('bum): surnas
185a2('bum): su sa smra
185a3('bum): sa dmasasasams ladzad / du mamams pa dam
185a4('bum): das chen po son pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang bag na/ mas dang sangs cad kyis las pang bste/ 'din kyang chub sems dpa' ma pa da po dgon pa lagasapa
185a5('bum): mongs su mi gtang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byang chub la yang 'dod pa 'i myed pa ste/ 'di
185a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i cho ga shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems
185a7('bum): 'du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba gang zhe na/
185b1('bum): 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la rtog par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpar/
185b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o//
185b3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i
185b4('bum): yon tan la smad pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'dar ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med
185b5('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yong/
185b6('bum): su gtang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba'o// de la byang
185b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa la de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum
186a1('bum): pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/
186a2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su
186a3('bum): spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos bgos pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
186a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na
186a5('bum): dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su skom pa'i sems mi skyed cing / de'i rgyus gos thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
186a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang
186a7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag
186b1('bum): sems can 'di dag rang rang gi bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la
186b2('bum): ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
186b3('bum): chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba
186b4('bum): de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas su spang ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub
186b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing 'thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod
186b6('bum): ba'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa
186b7('bum): yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o//
187a1('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhar spong ba yongs su spong ba gang de na/ 'di sa ste/ phyi rob kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
187a2('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyil ba yongs su spa
187a3('bum): bya ba yin zhen/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar du gcod na/ 'phags pa'i lam stsal ni smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la la smos kyang mi dgos kyi spam
187a4('bum): bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187a5('bum): chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/ gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci smos zhes
187a6('bum): nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yong
187a7('bum): su spang bar bya ba yin zhen/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
187b1('bum): chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos por mi dmi/
187b2('bum): bste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod nag
187b3('bum): dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nges 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'a
187b4('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o// de la sa drug pa la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang
187b5('bum): nas 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
187b6('bum): ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la/
187b7('bum): gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams su shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// phyin to//
188a1('bum): phyin par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba dang / mi brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar na
188a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/
188a3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spong bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas rang
188a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/
188a5('bum): slong mo ba mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o// 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi
188a6('bum): lam ma yin pas thog ma sems bskyed nas kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug
188a7('bum): yongs su spang bar bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// sems can du
188b1('bum): 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// srog tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// gang zag tu 'dzin par mi
188b2('bum): bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
188b3('bum): shin tu ma bskyed pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang
188b4('bum): la yang skye ba med pa de la rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas
188b5('bum): nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nges lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
188b6('bum): ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes
188b7('bum): su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu med pa'i phyir te/
189a1('bum): de ltar phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/
189a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skye mched la
189a3('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na skye mched la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
189a4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
189a5('bum): khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i
189a6('bum): dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
189a7('bum): sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten
189b1('bum): par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po meng pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub
189b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par
189b3('bum): chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la rten pas sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la
189b4('bum): rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
189b5('bum): chos su lta ba la rten pas chos mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// del
189b6('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la rten pas dge 'dun mthong bar
189b7('bum): mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
190a1('bum): dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la rten pas tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi/
190a2('bum): 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
190a3('bum): dpa' chen pos chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub
190a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la zhum par mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos
190a5('bum): thams cad stong pas stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o// de la ji ltar na
190a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
190a7('bum): chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad
190b1('bum): yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/ de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa'o//
190b2('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de la rmi
190b3('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brdze ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o//
190b4('bum): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro// de la byang chub
190b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang dbri ba med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dang /
190b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtog pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
190b7('bum): po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ ming dang gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes so/
191a2('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
191a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par
191a4('bum): rtog pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o// de la byang
191a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o// de la byang chub sems
191a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhig gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191a7('bum): po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/ khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug
191b1('bum): yang dag par 'dus pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thob pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o// de la bya
191b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du
191b3('bum): 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems
191b4('bum): khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
191b5('bum): po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro/
191b6('bum): yang de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na
191b7('bum): 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
192a1('bum): kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa
192a2('bum): la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
192a3('bum): sangs rgyas brnyan bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs
192a4('bum): rgyas kyi su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang
192a5('bum): po rab dang za ma shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
192a6('bum): chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems su sbyang ba'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192a7('bum): chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang na na// ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed pa ste/ de'i sems chos gang la
192b1('bum): yang mi 'jug pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las
192b2('bum): skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub
192b3('bum): pa gang zhe na pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to// nga la
192b4('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du bsams shing sred pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sem
192b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i
192b6('bum): phyir ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
192b7('bum): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang galto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub
193a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yong su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig
193a2('bum): pas khong du chud pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che rabs thams
193a3('bum): cad du rdzus shing skye ba ste ka'adi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phur sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum
193a4('bum): tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye bas/ 'dini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub se/
193a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ zam ze'i rogs che zhing mgo bar skye bste/ 'di na
193a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chung phun sum tshogs pa'o// nga la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193a7('bum): chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su phyeskye ba ste/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus phur sum tshogs pa'o// de la bya ma/
193b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor yun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang ldan pa
193b2('bum): nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhen/
193b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang de/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/ 'donani byang chub sems dpa' sem
193b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193b5('bum): rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub
193b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ khyad
193b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun bai nunar 'dug pa yin/ yal ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las thub pa yin/ me tog dang
194a1('bum): lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par 'gengs pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub
194a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa
194a3('bum): gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
194a4('bum): yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
194a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
194a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spungs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs
194a7('bum): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o//
194b1('bum): rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
194b2('bum): spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
194b3('bum): byon pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
194b4('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang // chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang
194b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad
194b6('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
194b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang // yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams
195a1('bum): la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa/
195a2('bum): rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang // rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod/
195a3('bum): pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la
195a4('bum): spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag
195a5('bum): par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rigs kyi/
195a6('bum): sa las yang dag par 'da'/ brgyad pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'// mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da' bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag
195a7('bum): par 'da'/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'da'// byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
195b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
195b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyab bam po re drug pa//
195b3('bum): rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
195b4('bum): nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan
195b5('bum): pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung /
195b6('bum): ba 'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ byung bar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang /
195b7('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'
196a1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab
196a2('bum): 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod
196a3('bum): chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
196a4('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
196a5('bum): 'gog pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
196a6('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dong du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'du shes stong pa nyid 'dud
196a7('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'du byed stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
196b1('bum): 'asmyung bar 'dod pa rnam par shes bsod pa nyid 'byung ba 'dod du byud do// dam myong na rang 'byor ba gzums song ba nyid na 'ams gsus nas bzung bar du/
196b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'du shes stong pa
196b3('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'du byed stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
196b4('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzug
196b5('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas
196b6('bum): slong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
196b7('bum): de ni rna ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dong du bang ngo // rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
197a1('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus stong pa nyid 'byung bar
197a2('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
197a3('bum): nas 'byung bar med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sna stong
197a4('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
197a5('bum): pa med do// lus stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
197a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig mig gis stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba rnabs stong pa'i phyir ro// sna snas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce lces stong ba'i phyir
197a7('bum): ro// / lus lus kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yid yid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
197b1('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dri stong pa
197b2('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ro stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
197b3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni reg stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'o chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir na
197b4('bum): na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgra stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
197b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// ji stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// ro stong pa nyid ni khams
197b6('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// reg stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
197b7('bum): med do// chos stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i
198a1('bum): phyir ro// sgra smras stong pa'i phyir ro// dri dris skyong ba'i phyir ro// ro ros stong pa'i phyir ro// reg reg gis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos chos kyis stong pa'i phyiraro//
198a2('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
198a3('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa
198a4('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
198a5('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa/
198a6('bum): de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa
198a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
198b1('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byur
198b2('bum): ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa medado//
198b3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa
198b4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro//
198b5('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par
198b6('bum): shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
198b7('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
199a1('bum): nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang
199a2('bum): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid/
199a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
199a4('bum): du gnas pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams
199a5('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
199a6('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
199a7('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// /
199b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//
199b2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
199b3('bum): de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong /
199b4('bum): pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
199b5('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dus
199b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid byung /
199b7('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/
200a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sna'i 'dus te
200a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams/
200a3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam
200a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med/
200a5('bum): do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
200a6('bum): brna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spyod pa'i phyir ro// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
200a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//
200b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rmi lam 'byung bar
200b2('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgyu ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni
200b3('bum): smig chu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sgra brnyan 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
200b4('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig yor 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de kyi
200b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
200b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// smig rgyu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// snga brnyan ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
200b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mig yor ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa/
201a1('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa
201a2('bum): phyir ro// sgyu ma ni sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir ro// smig rgyu ni smig rgyus stong pa'i phyir ro// sgra brnyan ni sgra brnyan gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mig yor ni mig yor gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
201a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar
201a4('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
201a5('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung /
201a6('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
201a7('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
201b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du garnas pa med do/
201b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams
201b3('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
201b4('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/
201b5('bum): 'di ltar sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo za nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba'i phyir ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
201b6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni brtson
201b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// shes rab /
202a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
202a2('bum): pa de ni nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
202a3('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
202a4('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
202a5('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
202a6('bum): pang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa/
202a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med/
202b1('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang ba nin stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod//
202b2('bum): du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
202b3('bum): ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mi dmigs pa spyod pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du dad do// rang spyod
202b4('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du bad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong
202b5('bum): pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang
202b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
202b7('bum): du gnas pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// /
203a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
203a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni kham gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
203a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bcwa
203a4('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dug na/
203a5('bum): ba med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
203a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang gi mtshan
203a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams/
203b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni 'ams
203b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
203b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid
203b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid
203b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
203b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// thogs dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dor ba med pa
203b7('bum): stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i
204a1('bum): phyir ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
204a2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
204a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
204a4('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni//
204a5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
204a6('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stobs rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
204a7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
204b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
204b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad
204b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// stongs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
204b4('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams
204b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab
204b6('bum): 'byor de ni'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang dag par
204b7('bum): spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po
205a1('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
205a2('bum): ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
205a3('bum): ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
205a4('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tshad med pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du
205a5('bum): zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
205a6('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mthar gyis gnas
205a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor
205b1('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sngo
205b2('bum): pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
205b3('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo
205b4('bum): nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
205b5('bum): ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa ma
205b6('bum): do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams
205b7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas sa
206a1('bum): med do// smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ra
206a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
206a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
206a4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo ba
206a5('bum): nyid ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid
206a6('bum): ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
206a7('bum): ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan
206b1('bum): cing meng pa chos rnams blang bar 'dod pa de ni bzungs kyi so rnams 'byung bar 'dod dubang ngo // phyi men/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kya bcang mi 'ams bsus nas 'drung ba med do//
206b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi za/
206b3('bum): nyid ni 'ams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par shes pa rnam
206b4('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo
206b5('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
206b6('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
206b7('bum): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus
207a1('bum): ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med
207a2('bum): do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do//
207a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de
207a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// so so/
207a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
207a6('bum): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa bag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
207a7('bum): pa de ni rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du bang ngo // rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
207b1('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du bang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
207b2('bum): ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ga nas
207b3('bum): pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
207b4('bum): sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo/
207b5('bum): nyid kyis spong ba'i phyir ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//
207b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar
207b7('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
208a1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni dgra bcom pa nyid khrung
208a2('bum): bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
208a3('bum): 'dod pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
208a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams
208a5('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
208a6('bum): gnas pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
208a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rnam pa
208b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i
208b2('bum): bo nyid ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// phyir/
208b3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rang byang
208b4('bum): chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams
208b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni ming 'byung bar
208b6('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung
208b7('bum): bar 'dod pa de ni brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med
209a1('bum): pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do//
209a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// brda stong
209a3('bum): pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
209a4('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do// gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
209a5('bum): ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
209a6('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// tha snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
209a7('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad // rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'gag pa med pa 'byung bar
209b1('bum): 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
209b2('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni rnam par byang ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do// rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//
209b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba meng // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
209b4('bum): ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa/
209b5('bum): med do// rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas/
209b6('bum): 'byung ba med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'gag pa med pa ni
209b7('bum): 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par byang ba med pa
210a1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des na 'di ltar
210a2('bum): theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas byung nas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/ gnas de ni bskyod du med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis ga
210a3('bum): 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ theg pa chen po de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas mi dmigs
210a4('bum): pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma
210a5('bum): yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin// migs
210a6('bum): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa yang
210a7('bum): ma yin pa mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhir du theg pa can par yang gnas pa yang ma yid/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab byor 'di lta// dper napas ma kyis mi
210b1('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
210b2('bum): zhen rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid
210b3('bum): la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos
210b4('bum): dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis
210b5('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas
210b6('bum): pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dod chag
210b7('bum): zad pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
211a1('bum): dpe na rab tu byung ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa rjen po yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa
211a2('bum): yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po ngal/
211a3('bum): gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin// mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg/
211a4('bum): pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin ka mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings
211a5('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am/

211a7('bum): gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro// rab tu byang ba'i dbyings rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
211b1('bum): bar phyir ro// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis song pa'i phyir ro// 'gog pa'i dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis song bar phyir ro//
211b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po re bdun pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin

211b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper/

212a1('bum): zhen rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do// 'du shes kyi ngo
